item.title: Getting 100 errrors... -.-
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[code]if(NPCID == 1577) {
if(donator == 2) {
toX = 2120;
toY = 4914;
sM(“Welcome to the Donator Christmas Event!”);
} else {
sM(“You need to be a donator to access this Christmas Event!”);
}
}

if(NPCID == 291){
if(HasItemAmount(4085, 3)){
deleteItem(4085, 3);
addItem(1552, 1);
sendInterface(“Thank you! Since you have donated to Frostiescape, I’ll give you this!”);
} else {
sendInterface(“The goblins have stollen my wax for my sled! I need three peices of wax!”);
sM(“WATCH OUT! YOUR IN THE PVP ZONE! SO OTHER DONATORS CAN ATTACK YOU!”);
}
}[/code]

Count your brackets. I also edited the checking for if you have the item. You had it so it was only checking for one piece of wax, not 3.

Read full topic
